description:
Discard 2 to draw 2.
If you have exactly 1 other card in hand, discard 1 to draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Discard 2 to draw 2.
If you have exactly 1 other card in hand, discard 1 to draw 1.
flavorText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx
name: Rummage
